title: Why Tablets Are the Future of Computing
text:
The conventional wisdom about tablet computers—that as a category, they’re no longer all that compelling, and might even be dying out—is wrong.
It isn’t that this analysis is irrational, because it comes straight from the available empirical data. It’s just that it ignores important trends that have implications for much of personal computing. Taken together, they add up to this: As notebook computers become thinner and lighter and...
